entry.title: The Robins: Robin Swap
entry.summary:
Author: SpiderFan_33

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,142Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 5

Summary: In a world where Bruce Wayne is presumed dead, the Robins must work together to protect the city of Gotham while they struggle to hold their makeshift, found family together. Their fragile status quo is disrupted after Damian Wayne, newly 18 and tired of playing sidekick to Dick Grayson's Batman, and Tim Drake, recent college graduate and newly on his own as Red Robin, swap bodies. Tim gets to go back to a time when things were simpler, while Damian gets to prove he can be the solo hero Dick doubts he's ready to be. But is this mix up and dream come true or a living nightmare? NOTE: This story is not yet complete and I'm unsure how long it will be, though if I like this world I may tell future stories in this continuity as well. I'm putting up what I have so far, so let me know what you think in the comments!

entry.title: a sex toy with a soul
entry.summary:
Author: DianBook24

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,151Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 117

Summary: And that's how Damian became this, the object of his brothers' desires. He doesn't even know what to say to his father. Would he really believe him or would he be like Todd and Drake say and end up as a liar? His father didn't even know of his existence until three years ago when he arrived at the mansion. He never wanted him, he had never shown it. Maybe he knows and doesn't even care. He has no one to turn to. He's in a bottomless pit that he blames himself for creating.

entry.title: TimDami week 2025: Seven Days to Save a Soul
entry.summary:
Author: ShadowedRogueBat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,427Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 43

Summary: Damian Wayne has already gone to hell once. He has no desire to go back there, going so far as to meet with John Constantine to find a way to prevent it. If only Drake would stop sticking his pretty nose into Damian's business. Timothy Drake trusts Damian. Of course, after all this time working together, he does. But he can't help investigating when he finds Damian meeting with Constantine and sneaking away to abandoned league bases. He just wants to know what Damian is up to. The attraction he feels for the younger man has nothing to do with it, of course. TimDami week 2025 has inspired a story out of me.
